    • Method Detail

      • Advance_GetObj

        public Obj Advance_GetObj(Ref ref)
        advanced function to get object from Document to edit.
        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        ref - PDF cross reference ID, which got from:
        Advance_NewIndirectObj()
        Advance_GetCatalog()
        Advance_GetPage()
        Advance_NewFlateStream()
        Advance_NewRawStream()
        Returns:
        PDF Object or null.

      • Advance_NewIndirectObj

        public Ref Advance_NewIndirectObj()
        advanced function to create an empty indirect object to edit.
        this method require premium license.
        Returns:
        PDF cross reference to new object, using Advance_GetObj to get Object data.

      • Advance_NewIndirectAndCopyObj

        public Ref Advance_NewIndirectAndCopyObj(Obj obj)
        advanced function to create an indirect object, and then copy source object to this indirect object.
        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        obj - source object to be copied.
        Returns:
        PDF cross reference to new object, using Advance_GetObj to get Object data.

      • Advance_NewFlateStream

        public Ref Advance_NewFlateStream(byte[] source)
        advanced function to create a stream using zflate compression(zlib).
        stream byte contents can't modified, once created.
        the byte contents shall auto compress and encrypt by native library.
        this method require premium license, and need Document.SetCache() invoked.
        Parameters:
        source -
        Returns:
        PDF cross reference to new object, using Advance_GetObj to get Object data.

      • Advance_NewRawStream

        public Ref Advance_NewRawStream(byte[] source)
        advanced function to create a stream using raw data.
        if u pass compressed data to this method, u shall modify dictionary of this stream.
        like "Filter" and other item from dictionary.
        the byte contents shall auto encrypt by native library, if document if encrypted.
        this method require premium license, and need Document.SetCache() invoked.
        Parameters:
        source -
        Returns:
        PDF cross reference to new object, using Advance_GetObj to get Object data.

      • Advance_GetRef

        public Ref Advance_GetRef()
        advanced function to get reference of catalog object(root object of PDF).
        this method require premium license.
        Returns:
        PDF cross reference to new object, using Advance_GetObj to get Object data.

      • Advance_Reload

        public void Advance_Reload()
        advanced function to reload document objects.
        this method require premium license.
        all pages object return from Document.GetPage() shall not available, after this method invoked.

      • IsOpened

        public boolean IsOpened()
        check if opened.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • Create

        public int Create(java.lang.String path)
        create a empty PDF document
        Parameters:
        path - path to create
        Returns:
        0 or less than 0 means failed, same as Open.

      • CreateForStream

        public int CreateForStream(Document.PDFStream stream)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        create a empty PDF document
        Parameters:
        stream - stream to create
        Returns:
        0 or less than 0 means failed, same as Open.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • SetCache

        public boolean SetCache(java.lang.String path)
        set cache file to PDF.
        a professional or premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to save some temporary data, compressed images and so on
        Returns:
        true or false

      • SetFontDel

        public void SetFontDel(Document.PDFFontDelegate del)
        set font delegate to PDF.
        a professional or premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        del - delegate for font mapping, or null to remove delegate.

      • Open

        public int Open(java.lang.String path,
                java.lang.String password)
        open document.
        first time, SDK try password as user password, and then try password as owner password.
        Parameters:
        path - PDF file to be open.
        password - password or null.
        Returns:
        error code:
        0:succeeded, and continue
        -1:need input password
        -2:unknown encryption
        -3:damaged or invalid format
        -10:access denied or invalid file path
        others:unknown error

      • OpenMem

        public int OpenMem(byte[] data,
                   java.lang.String password)
        open document in memory. first time, SDK try password as user password, and then try password as owner password.
        Parameters:
        data - data for whole PDF file in byte array. developers should retain array data, till document closed.
        password - password or null.
        Returns:
        error code:
        0:succeeded, and continue
        -1:need input password
        -2:unknown encryption
        -3:damaged or invalid format
        -10:access denied or invalid file path
        others:unknown error

      • OpenStream

        public int OpenStream(Document.PDFStream stream,
                      java.lang.String password)
        open document from stream. first time, SDK try password as user password, and then try password as owner password.
        Parameters:
        stream - PDFStream object.
        password - password or null.
        Returns:
        error code:
        0:succeeded, and continue
        -1:need input password
        -2:unknown encryption
        -3:damaged or invalid format
        -10:access denied or invalid file path
        others:unknown error

      • OpenStreamWithoutLoadingPages

        public int OpenStreamWithoutLoadingPages(Document.PDFStream stream,
                                         java.lang.String password)

      • RunJS

        public boolean RunJS(java.lang.String js,
                     Document.PDFJSDelegate del)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        run javascript, NOTICE:considering some complex js, this method is not thread-safe.
        this method require premium license, it always return false if using other license type.
        Parameters:
        js - javascript string, can't be null.
        del - delegate for javascript running, can't be null.
        Returns:
        if js or del is null, or no premium license actived, return false.
        if success running, return true.
        otherwise, an exception shall throw to java.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • GetEmbedFilesCount

        public int GetEmbedFilesCount()
        get embed files count, for document level.
        this method require premium license, it always return 0 if using other license type.
        Returns:
        count

      • GetEmbedFileName

        public java.lang.String GetEmbedFileName(int index)
        get name of embed file.
        Parameters:
        index - range in [0, GetEmbedFilesCount())
        Returns:
        name of embed file

      • GetEmbedFileDesc

        public java.lang.String GetEmbedFileDesc(int index)
        get Description of embed file.
        Parameters:
        index - range in [0, GetEmbedFilesCount())
        Returns:

      • GetEmbedFileData

        public boolean GetEmbedFileData(int index,
                                java.lang.String save_path)
        get embed file data, and save to save_path
        Parameters:
        index - range in [0, GetEmbedFilesCount())
        save_path - absolute path to save embed file.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • GetPermission

        public int GetPermission()
        get permission of PDF, this value defined in PDF reference 1.7
        mostly, it means the permission from encryption.
        this method require a professional or premium license. bit 1-2 reserved
        bit 3(0x4) print
        bit 4(0x8) modify
        bit 5(0x10) extract text or image
        others: see PDF reference
        Returns:
        permission flags

      • GetPerm

        public int GetPerm()
        get permission of PDF, this value defined in "Perm" entry in Catalog object.
        mostly, it means the permission from signature.
        this method require a professional or premium license.
        Returns:
        0 means not defined
        1 means can't modify
        2 means can modify some form fields
        3 means can do any modify

      • ExportForm

        public java.lang.String ExportForm()
        export form data as xml string.
        this method require premium license.
        Returns:
        xml string or null.

      • Close

        public void Close()
        close the document.

      • GetPage0

        public Page GetPage0()
        fast get first page, used in first page thumbnail generating.
        do not use this method for other purpose.
        Returns:
        Page object or null.

        Parameters:

        public int GetPageCount()

        pages count.

      • GetPageWidth

        public float GetPageWidth(int pageno)
        get page width by page NO.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO. range:[0, GetPageCount()-1]
        Returns:
        width value.

      • GetPageHeight

        public float GetPageHeight(int pageno)
        get page height by page NO.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO. range:[0, GetPageCount()-1]
        Returns:
        height value.

      • GetPageLabel

        public java.lang.String GetPageLabel(int pageno)
        get label of page
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page index number
        Returns:
        json string or pure text. for json: name is style name of number.
        for example:
        {"D":2} is "2"
        {"R":3} is "III"
        {"r":4} is "iv"
        {"A":5} is "E"
        {"a":6} is "f"
        for pure text: the text is the label.

      • GetPagesMaxSize

        public float[] GetPagesMaxSize()
        get max width and max height of all pages.
        Returns:
        2 elements container width and height values, or null if failed.

      • GetMeta

        public java.lang.String GetMeta(java.lang.String tag)
        get meta data of document.
        Parameters:
        tag - Predefined values:"Title", "Author", "Subject", "Keywords", "Creator", "Producer", "CreationDate", "ModDate".
        or you can pass any key that self-defined.
        Returns:
        Meta string value, or null.

      • GetXMP

        public java.lang.String GetXMP()
        get XMP string from document.
        Returns:
        null or XML string.

      • GetID

        public byte[] GetID(int index)
        get id of document.
        Parameters:
        index - must 0 or 1, 0 means first 16 bytes, 1 means last 16 bytes.
        Returns:
        bytes or null if no id for this document.

      • SetMeta

        public boolean SetMeta(java.lang.String tag,
                       java.lang.String val)
        set meta data for document.
        this method valid only in premium version.
        Parameters:
        tag - Predefined values:"Title", "Author", "Subject", "Keywords", "Creator", "Producer", "CreationDate", "ModDate".
        or you can pass any key that self-defined.
        val - string value.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • GetOutlines

        public Document.Outline GetOutlines()
        get first root outline item.
        Returns:
        handle value of first root outline item. or null if no outlines.

      • CanSave

        public boolean CanSave()
        check if document can be modified or saved.
        this always return false, if no license actived.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • Save

        public boolean Save()
        save the document.
        this always return false, if no license actived.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • SaveAs

        public boolean SaveAs(java.lang.String path,
                      boolean rem_sec)
        save as the document to another file.
        this method require a professional or premium license.
        Parameters:
        path - path to save.
        rem_sec - remove security info?
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • EncryptAs

        public boolean EncryptAs(java.lang.String dst,
                         java.lang.String upswd,
                         java.lang.String opswd,
                         int perm,
                         int method,
                         byte[] id)
        encrypt document and save as the document to another file.
        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        dst - path to save same as path parameter of SaveAs.
        upswd - user password, can be null.
        opswd - owner password, can be null.
        perm - permission to set, same as GetPermission() method.
        bit 1-2 reserved
        bit 3(0x4) print
        bit 4(0x8) modify
        bit 5(0x10) extract text or image
        others: see PDF reference
        method - set 3 means using AES 256bits encrypt(Acrobat X), V=5 and R = 6 mode, others AES with V=4 and R=4 mode.
        id - must be 32 bytes for file ID. it is divided to 2 array in native library, as each 16 bytes.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • IsEncrypted

        public boolean IsEncrypted()
        check if document is encrypted.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • NewRootOutline

        public boolean NewRootOutline(java.lang.String label,
                              int pageno,
                              float top)
        new a root outline to document, it insert first root outline to Document.
        the old first root outline, shall be next of this outline.
        Parameters:
        label - label to display
        pageno - pageno to jump
        top - y position in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false

      • ImportStart

        public Document.ImportContext ImportStart(Document src)
        Start import operations, import page from src
        a premium license is required for this method.
        you shall maintenance the source Document object until all pages are imported and ImportContext.Destroy() invoked.
        Parameters:
        src - source Document object that opened.
        Returns:
        a context object used in ImportPage.

      • ImportPage

        public boolean ImportPage(Document.ImportContext ctx,
                          int srcno,
                          int dstno)
        import a page to the document.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        do not forget to invoke ImportContext.Destroy() after all pages are imported.
        Parameters:
        ctx - context object created from ImportStart
        srcno - 0 based page NO. from source Document that passed to ImportStart.
        dstno - 0 based page NO. to insert in this document object.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • NewPage

        public Page NewPage(int pageno,
                    float w,
                    float h)
        insert a page to Document
        if pagheno >= page_count, it do same as append.
        otherwise, insert to pageno.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        w - page width in PDF coordinate
        h - page height in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        Page object or null means failed.

      • RemovePage

        public boolean RemovePage(int pageno)
        remove page by page NO.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • MovePage

        public boolean MovePage(int pageno1,
                        int pageno2)
        move the page to other position.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno1 - page NO, move from
        pageno2 - page NO, move to
        Returns:
        true or false

      • NewFontCID

        public Document.DocFont NewFontCID(java.lang.String font_name,
                                   int style)
        create a font object, used to write texts.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        font_name -
        font name exists in font list.
        using Global.getFaceCount(), Global.getFaceName() to enumerate fonts.
        style -
        (style&1) means bold,
        (style&2) means Italic,
        (style&8) means embed,
        (style&16) means vertical writing, mostly used in Asia fonts.
        Returns:
        DocFont object or null is failed.

      • NewGState

        public Document.DocGState NewGState()
        create a ExtGraphicState object, used to set alpha values.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Returns:
        DocGState object or null.

      • NewImage

        public Document.DocImage NewImage(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                                  boolean has_alpha)
        create an image from Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap object in ARGB_8888/ARGB_4444/RGB_565 format.
        has_alpha - generate alpha channel information?
        Returns:
        DocImage object or null.

      • NewImageJPEG

        public Document.DocImage NewImageJPEG(java.lang.String path)
        create an image from JPEG/JPG file.
        supported image color space:
        --GRAY
        --RGB
        --CMYK
        Parameters:
        path - path to JPEG file.
        Returns:
        DocImage object or null.

      • NewImageByMem

        public Document.DocImage NewImageByMem(byte[] data,
                                       int len)
        create an image from JPEG/JPG byte array.
        supported image color space:
        --GRAY
        --RGB
        --CMYK
        Parameters:
        data - byte array include whole jpg file.
        len - byte length of data.
        Returns:
        DocImage object or null.

      • ChangePageRect

        public boolean ChangePageRect(int pageno,
                              float dl,
                              float dt,
                              float dr,
                              float db)
        change page rect.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        dl - delta to left, page_left += dl;
        dt - delta to top, page_top += dt;
        dr - delta to right, page_right += dr;
        db - delta to bottom, page_bottom += db;
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • SetPageRotate

        public boolean SetPageRotate(int pageno,
                             int degree)
        set page rotate.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        degree - rotate angle in degree, must be 90 * n.
        Returns:
        true or false

        verify the signature
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        sign - signature object from Annotation.GetSign()
        Returns:
        0 if verify OK, others are error.
